mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT PB.PB_NO ,CREATOR_ID ,PB_TITLE ,PB_CREATE_DATE ,PB_UPDATE_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PB_RECOMMEND PBR WHERE PB.PB_NO = PBR.PB_NO) AS PB_RECOMMAND_COUNT ,PB_VISIT_COUNT ,PFL.PB_FNO AS pb_thumbnail_fno ,CEIL(RANK() OVER(ORDER BY PB.PB_NO DESC)/12) AS PAGENO FROM PHOTO_BOARD PB, (SELECT PB_NO, MIN(PB_FNO) AS PB_FNO FROM PB_FILE_LIST GROUP BY PB_NO) PFL WHERE PB.PB_NO = PFL.PB_NO(+) ORDER BY PB.PB_NO DESC) WHERE PAGENO = #{pageNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT PB.PB_NO ,CREATOR_ID ,PB_TITLE ,PB_CREATE_DATE ,PB_UPDATE_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PB_RECOMMEND PBR WHERE PB.PB_NO = PBR.PB_NO) AS PB_RECOMMAND_COUNT ,PB_VISIT_COUNT ,PFL.PB_FNO AS pb_thumbnail_fno ,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY PB.PB_VISIT_COUNT DESC) RNK FROM PHOTO_BOARD PB, (SELECT PB_NO, MIN(PB_FNO) AS PB_FNO FROM PB_FILE_LIST GROUP BY PB_NO) PFL WHERE PB.PB_NO = PFL.PB_NO(+) ORDER BY PB.PB_VISIT_COUNT DESC) WHERE RNK<=4

SELECT PB.CREATOR_ID ,PB.PB_NO ,PB.PB_TITLE ,PB.PB_CONTENT ,PB.PB_CREATE_DATE ,PB.PB_UPDATE_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PB_RECOMMEND PBR WHERE PB.PB_NO = PBR.PB_NO) AS PB_RECOMMAND_COUNT ,PB.PB_VISIT_COUNT FROM PHOTO_BOARD PB WHERE PB.PB_NO = #{pb_no} ORDER BY PB_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PHOTO_BOARD SET PB_VISIT_COUNT = PB_VISIT_COUNT + 1 WHERE PB_NO = #{pb_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PB_COMMENT WHERE PB_NO = #{pb_no} ORDER BY PB_COMMENT_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PHOTO_BOARD(CREATOR_ID, PB_NO, PB_TITLE, PB_CONTENT, PB_CREATE_DATE, PB_UPDATE_DATE, PB_RECOMMAND_COUNT, PB_VISIT_COUNT) VALUES(#{creator_id}, #{pb_no}, #{pb_title}, #{pb_content}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE PHOTO_BOARD SET PB_TITLE = #{pb_title}, PB_CONTENT = #{pb_content} WHERE PB_NO = #{pb_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PB_RECOMMEND WHERE ID LIKE #{id} AND PB_NO = #{pb_no}
